Summary: REDCRAFT reappears over Central Park 111009 NYC.
divs: Sighting DetailsBlack Choppers making noise outside so I look out with my cam and I catch the same craft from 110209. Same blinking pattern. This time it turned white at times.. Black Helicopters were around looking at time I guess. I ran to Central Park to catch it doing a couple laps over the park. I've seen this thing fly very low and it looks like its the size of a bus. Huge and can mimic planes.. I've seen it turn from a helicopter to an airplane in my face. It flew very low to me and my wife one time. I think the "Black Helicopters" are the UFOs but mimicking Helicopters... See more from this night at vik456 on youtube..
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were 2 other sightings in New York on or around November 10th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
